PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
  MODULE STATUS_0100.																																
  MODULE INIT_DATA_0100.																																
  FIELD ZEA_BSEG-SAKNR MODULE CHECK_SAKNR. " BP코드로 입력한 GL계정 CHECK																																
  MODULE INIT_ALV_0100.																																
																																
  MODULE CLEAR_OK_CODE.																																
																																
																																
*& ---------------------------------------------------------------------																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
*& ---------------------------------------------------------------------																																
* -- EXIT-COMMAND ------------------------------------------------------																																
  MODULE EXIT_0100 AT EXIT-COMMAND.																																
																																
  " 1. 전기키 유효성 체크																																
  FIELD ZEA_TBSL-BSCHL MODULE CHECK_BSCHL.																																
																																
  " 2. 전기키, GL계정 CHECK																																
  CHAIN.																																
    FIELD ZEA_TBSL-BSCHL. " 전기키																																
    FIELD ZEA_BSEG-SAKNR. " GL계정																																
    MODULE CHECK_SAKNR ON CHAIN-REQUEST.																																
  ENDCHAIN.																																
																																
  CHAIN.																																
    FIELD ZEA_BSEG-DMBTR. " 금액																																
    FIELD S0100-TAX.      " 세금 계정																																
    FIELD ZEA_BSEG-DMBTR MODULE CHECK_ENTER. " 금액 0원 입력 체크																																
  ENDCHAIN.																																
																																
* -- USER_COMMAND ------------------------------------------------------																																
  MODULE USER_COMMAND_0100.																																
  FIELD ZEA_BSEG-SAKNR MODULE CHECK_SAKNR_TAX. " 전기키 부가세 계정 체크																																
																																
*& ---------------------------------------------------------------------																																
PROCESS ON VALUE-REQUEST.																																
*& ---------------------------------------------------------------------																																
  FIELD ZEA_TBSL-BSCHL MODULE F4_BSCHL.
